Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are immediately followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed by SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers appearing in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers appearing in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are repeated more than once within the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in cases where SW-Reviewer No Response occurs
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that precede any reviewer-related reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed across the entire log
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of cases containing SW-AE Assign Reviewers that also contain at least one instance of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurring before SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in cases that undergo major revision (i.e., include SW-EIC Major Revision)
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed within 7 days by a reviewer response (SW-Reviewer Agreed, Declined, or Unavailable)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to total reviewer assignment attempts (including RW-AE Assign Reviewers and RSW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'RW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur in the initial submission phase (before any revision activity such as Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases where 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' does not happen

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in cases that reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision without any SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are part of loops involving repeated reviewer assignments due to declinations or unavailability
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
